pkgmetadata.longdescription: Install from `PyPI <https://pypi.org/project/sqlite3-api>`_:: pip install sqlite3-apiInstall from `GitHub <https://github.com/AlexDev-py/sqlite3_api.git>`_:: git clone https://github.com/AlexDev-py/sqlite3_api.gitMore information in the`GitHub page <https://github.com/AlexDev-py/sqlite3_api/tree/2.0.0>`_
